title: A Practical Introduction to Phonetics.pdf
description:
A Practical Introduction to Phonetics. J. C. Catford. The 2nd edition.

The best book to study phonetics.
The best book to investigate your own vocal tract.
The best book to develop motor sensation.
The best book to acquire new pronunciation.

This book is hard for those whose first language is not English,
because target readers are from English speaking countries.
Some of the exercises are very difficult for non-English native speakers,
whereas the same exercises are easy for English natives. 
But the book is worth to face it.

If you are a learner of English, you will find real precise instructions
how to produce English sounds, though this book wasn't designed for that. 

Unfortunately, it's a scanned PDF. As an e-book version doesn't exist
